camera.desc: The Canon EOS 1DX Mark III is a professional DSLR delivering fast performance, excellent image quality, 4K video, and robust durability.
The Canon EOS 5D Mark IV offers high-resolution imaging, 4K video, fast autofocus, and durable build for professionals and serious enthusiasts alike.
The Canon EOS 6D Mark II is a full-frame DSLR featuring a 26.2MP sensor, DIGIC 7 processor, 45-point autofocus, and vari-angle touchscreen.
The Canon EOS 90D is a versatile DSLR featuring a 32.5MP APS-C sensor, 10fps shooting, 4K video, and 45-point autofocus system.
The Canon EOS 7D Mark II is a professional-grade DSLR tailored for sports and wildlife photography, offering high-speed performance and durability.
The Canon EOS 850D is a versatile DSLR featuring a 24.1MP APS-C sensor, DIGIC 8 processor, 4K video, and vari-angle touchscreen.
The Canon EOS 250D (also known as EOS Rebel SL3 or EOS 200D Mark II) is a compact, lightweight DSLR designed for beginners and enthusiasts.
The EOS 200D is notable as one of the world's lightest DSLRs with a movable screen, making it highly portable and user-friendly for on-the-go shooting.
The Canon EOS 77D is a versatile Digital SLR featuring a 24.2MP APS-C sensor, Dual Pixel AF, and DIGIC 7 processor.
The Canon EOS 80D is a versatile Digital SLR featuring a 24.2MP APS-C sensor, Dual Pixel AF, and 7fps continuous shooting.
The Canon EOS 20D is an 8.2MP DSLR featuring a 22.5×15.0mm APS-C CMOS sensor, DIGIC II processor, and 5fps continuous shooting.
The Nikon D6 is Nikon's flagship full-frame DSLR, designed for professional photographers requiring speed, precision, and reliability and 4K UHD video
The Nikon D850 is a 45.7MP full-frame DSLR, offering 7fps continuous shooting, 4K UHD video, and excellent dynamic range.
The Nikon D780 is a 24.5MP full-frame DSLR with excellent autofocus, 4K UHD video, and superior low-light performance.
The Nikon D750 is a 24.3MP full-frame DSLR offering fast autofocus, 6.5fps continuous shooting, and 1080p full HD video.
The Nikon D500 is a 20.9MP APS-C DSLR with 10fps burst, 4K video, and pro-level autofocus for action photography.
The Nikon D7500 is a 20.9MP APS-C DSLR offering 8fps shooting, 4K UHD video, and excellent ISO performance for enthusiasts.
The Nikon D5600 is a 24.2MP APS-C DSLR featuring a vari-angle touchscreen, built-in Wi-Fi, and Full HD 1080p video.
The Nikon D3500 is a 24.2MP APS-C DSLR offering great image quality, easy controls, long battery life, and beginner-friendly features.
The Nikon D610 is a 24.3MP full-frame DSLR with dual card slots, 6fps shooting, and excellent image quality for professionals.
The Nikon D7200 is a 24.2MP APS-C DSLR offering 6fps burst, excellent dynamic range, built-in Wi-Fi, and Full HD video.
The Pentax K-1 Mark II is a 36.4MP full-frame DSLR with Pixel Shift Resolution, 5-axis stabilization, and weather-sealed rugged design.
The Pentax K-3 Mark III is a 25.7MP APS-C DSLR with fast burst shooting, advanced autofocus, and durable weather-resistant magnesium alloy body.
The Pentax K-70 is a 24.2MP APS-C DSLR with weather sealing, image stabilization, vari-angle LCD, and excellent low-light performance.
The Pentax KP is a 24.3MP APS-C DSLR with high ISO performance, in-body stabilization, compact design, and customizable controls.
The Nikon Z9 is a 45.7MP full-frame mirrorless camera offering 20fps shooting, 8K video, and advanced autofocus for professionals.
The Nikon Z8 is a 45.7MP full-frame mirrorless camera with 8K video, fast autofocus, and excellent dynamic range for professionals.
The Nikon Z7 II is a 45.7MP full-frame mirrorless camera with dual processors, 4K video, and improved autofocus performance.
The Nikon Z6 II is a 24.5MP full-frame mirrorless camera offering 4K video, dual processors, and excellent low-light performance.
The Nikon Z5 is a 24.3MP full-frame mirrorless camera with 4K video, in-body stabilization, and excellent image quality for enthusiasts.
The Canon EOS R3 is a 24.1MP full-frame mirrorless camera with 30fps burst, 6K video, and advanced autofocus technology.
The Canon EOS R5 is a 45MP full-frame mirrorless camera offering 8K video, 20fps burst, and superior autofocus performance.
The Canon EOS R8 is a 24.2MP full-frame mirrorless camera with 4K video, fast autofocus, and compact, lightweight design.
The Canon EOS R7 is a 32.5MP APS-C mirrorless camera with 4K video, 15fps burst, and advanced autofocus system.
The Canon EOS R10 is a 24.2MP APS-C mirrorless camera with 4K video, 15fps burst, and advanced autofocus system.
The Sony Alpha 1 is a 50.1MP full-frame mirrorless camera offering 30fps shooting, 8K video, and advanced autofocus performance.
The Sony Alpha 7R V is a 61MP full-frame mirrorless camera with AI autofocus, 8K video, and excellent image detail.
The Sony Alpha 7 IV is a 33MP full-frame mirrorless camera with 4K video, fast autofocus, and excellent dynamic range.
The Sony Alpha 9 II is a 24.2MP full-frame mirrorless camera offering 20fps blackout-free shooting, fast autofocus, and professional connectivity.
The Sony Alpha 6600 is a 24.2MP APS-C mirrorless camera with in-body stabilization, 4K video, and long battery life.
The Panasonic Lumix S1R is a 47.3MP full-frame mirrorless camera offering 4K video, robust build, and exceptional image quality.
The Panasonic Lumix GH6 is a 25.2MP Micro Four Thirds camera with 5.7K video, advanced stabilization, and professional video features.
The Panasonic Lumix S5 II is a 24.2MP full-frame mirrorless camera with phase-detect autofocus, 6K video, and powerful image stabilization.
The Panasonic Lumix G9 II is a 25.2MP Micro Four Thirds camera with 5.7K video, advanced autofocus, and robust build.
The Panasonic Lumix FZ2500 is a 20.1MP bridge camera with a 20x Leica lens, 4K video, and advanced stabilization.
The Fujifilm X-H2S is a 26.1MP APS-C mirrorless camera with 4K 120p video, in-body stabilization, and advanced autofocus performance.
The Fujifilm X-H2 is a 40.2MP APS-C mirrorless camera offering 8K video, 7-stop in-body stabilization, and advanced autofocus.
The Fujifilm X-T5 is a 40.2MP APS-C mirrorless camera with 4K 60p video, in-body stabilization, and advanced autofocus system.
The Fujifilm X-S20 is a 26.1MP APS-C mirrorless camera with 5-axis in-body stabilization, 6.2K 30p video, and vlog mode.
The Fujifilm X-T4 is a 26.1MP APS-C mirrorless camera offering 4K 60p video, in-body stabilization, and advanced autofocus system.
The Sony Cyber-shot RX100 VII is a 20.1MP compact camera featuring a 24–200mm zoom lens, 4K video, and advanced autofocus.
The Sony ZV-1 is a 20.1MP compact camera with 4K video, fast autofocus, built-in mic, and flip-out screen.
The Sony Cyber-shot RX100 VI is a 20.1MP compact camera featuring a 24–200mm zoom lens, 4K video, and fast autofocus.
The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W560 is a 14.1MP compact camera with 4x zoom, 720p HD video, and Sweep Panorama mode.
The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX500 is an 18.2MP compact camera featuring a 30x optical zoom, 180° LCD, and Full HD video.
The Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark III is a 20.1MP compact camera with 4K video, livestreaming, flip-up screen, and microphone input.
The Canon PowerShot G5 X Mark II is a 20.1MP compact camera featuring a 5x zoom lens, 4K video, and pop-up viewfinder.
The Canon PowerShot G1 X Mark III is a 24.2MP APS-C compact camera with 3x zoom, Dual Pixel AF, and Full HD video
The Canon PowerShot SX740 HS is a 20.3MP compact camera with 40x zoom, 4K video, flip-up screen, and Bluetooth.
The Samsung WB350F is a 16.3MP compact camera featuring a 21x optical zoom lens, Wi-Fi, NFC, and Full HD video recording
The Fujifilm X100V is a 26.1MP APS-C mirrorless camera with a fixed 23mm f/2 lens, hybrid viewfinder, and 4K video.
The Fujifilm XF10 is a 24.2MP APS-C compact camera featuring an 18.5mm f/2.8 fixed lens, 4K video, and Wi-Fi.
The Nikon Coolpix A1000 is a 16MP camera with a 35x zoom lens, 4K UHD video, tilting LCD, and Wi-Fi.
The Ricoh GR IIIx is a 24.2MP APS-C compact camera featuring a 40mm f/2.8 lens, in-body stabilization, and touchscreen.
The Panasonic Lumix LX100 II is a 17MP large-sensor compact camera featuring a 24–75mm f/1.7–2.8 Leica lens, 4K video.
The Panasonic Lumix ZS200 is a 20.1MP compact camera with a 15x zoom, 4K video, electronic viewfinder, and 1-inch sensor.
The Panasonic Lumix LX10 is a 20.1MP compact camera with a 1-inch sensor, Leica lens, 4K video, and touchscreen.
The Olympus Tough TG-6 is a 12MP rugged camera featuring 4x zoom, 4K video, macro mode, GPS, and waterproofing to 15m.
The Olympus Stylus 1s is a 12MP bridge camera with a 28–300mm f/2.8 lens, EVF, tilting touchscreen, Wi-Fi, and Full HD video.
The Leica Q2 is a 47.3MP full-frame compact camera with 28mm f/1.7 lens, 4K video, weather sealing, and OLED viewfinder.
The Leica D-Lux 7 is a 17MP compact camera with 24–75mm f/1.7–2.8 lens, 4K video, EVF, and Wi-Fi.
The GoPro Hero 12 Black is a 27MP action camera featuring 5.3K video, HyperSmooth stabilization, HDR, and better battery.
The GoPro Hero 11 Black is a 27MP action camera featuring 5.3K60 video, HyperSmooth 5.0 stabilization, and a 1/1.9 sensor.
The GoPro Hero10 Black is a 23MP action camera featuring 5.3K60 video, HyperSmooth 4.0, dual touchscreens, and waterproof design.
The GoPro Hero9 Black is a 20MP action camera featuring 5K video at 30fps, HyperSmooth 3.0, and improved battery.
The DJI Osmo Action 3 offers 4K video, rugged design, long battery life, and front and back touchscreens.
The DJI Action 2 features a modular magnetic design, 4K/120fps video, 155° FOV, and waterproof capabilities up to 10m.
The DJI Osmo Pocket 3 offers 4K/60fps video, 3-axis stabilization, compact design, touchscreen, and enhanced AI-powered features for smooth shooting.
The Insta360 ONE X2 is a 360-degree action camera with 5.7K video, FlowState stabilization, waterproof design, and a touchscreen.
The Insta360 GO 2 is a tiny 1440p action camera with 3-axis stabilization, waterproofing, and intuitive app-based editing capabilities.
The Insta360 ONE RS is a modular action camera with 4K video, FlowState stabilization, 360-degree capture, and waterproof capabilities.
Instax Mini 90 Neo Classic is a stylish instant camera with bulb mode, macro, double exposure, flash control, and rechargeable battery.
The Fujifilm Instax Mini 26 is a compact instant camera with selfie mirror, auto exposure, close-up lens, and easy dual shutter.
The Fujifilm Instax Mini 11 is a stylish instant camera with automatic exposure, selfie mode, built-in flash, and easy-to-use features.
The Polaroid Now+ is an instant camera with Bluetooth, manual controls, lens filters, and creative features, capturing high-quality instant photos.
The Polaroid Go is a compact instant camera with a 1:1 square format, self-timer, double exposure, and creative filters.
The Kodak Printomatic is an instant print camera with 10MP resolution, auto-flash, built-in printer, and ZINK photo paper compatibility.
The Kodak Smile is a portable instant print camera with 10MP resolution, a 3.5-inch LCD, and ZINK photo paper support.
The Kodak Ektar H35 is a 35mm half-frame film camera, featuring compact design, automatic exposure, and high-quality color film shooting.
The Kodak Ultra F9 is a compact, reusable 35mm film camera featuring a 31mm fixed-focus lens, built-in flash, and film winding.
The Kodak i60 is a compact, reusable 35mm film camera featuring a 31mm f/10 fixed-focus lens, built-in pop-up flash.
The Yashica Electro 35 is a classic 35mm rangefinder camera with aperture-priority auto exposure and a sharp 45mm f/1.7 lens.
The Yashica FX-3 is a compact, manual 35mm SLR featuring a Contax/Yashica mount, 1/1000s shutter, and LED metering system.
Yashica MF-2 is a compact 35mm film camera featuring a 38mm f/3.8 fixed-focus lens, 1/125s shutter, and built-in flash.
With a 1-inch CMOS sensor, 5.4K video, 31-minute battery life, and obstacle sensors, it delivers professional video and photography.
This drone features 4K video, a 48MP camera, 34-minute flight time, and intelligent flight modes for intermediate to professional use.

This gimbal supports a 3kg payload, features a touchscreen, Bluetooth shutter, auto-lock arms, and works with all major DSLR/mirrorless cameras.
This compact, strong tripod features an Arca-Swiss mount and mobile compatibility; its included Arca plate fits most major camera brands seamlessly.
Tripod featuring a quick-release system, fluid head options, and a compact design, with a universal 1/4 screw mount for versatility.
This gimbal supports a 3.3kg payload, features a built-in light/mic, ergonomic design, and widely supports Sony, Canon, Nikon, and more.
Monopod featuring a fluid video head, foot base, and tilt drag control, with standard mount supporting a wide range of cameras.
This ultra-light monopod features twist locks and a budget-friendly build, with 1/4-20 and 3/8-16 mounts for versatile camera support.
This modular and compact tripod boasts a high load-to-weight ratio, featuring an Arca-Swiss plate and a universal screw for versatile compatibility.
This gimbal supports a 2kg payload, ideal for mirrorless kits, and includes both Arca and Manfrotto baseplates for versatile mounting options.
This monopod features a quick-release system, modular foot, and professional mobility, ensuring compatibility across brands for versatile camera support.
This tripod features flexible legs, a ball head, and a portable design, with a universal 1/4” screw mount for versatile use.

This high-capacity battery powers monitors, rigs, and cameras via dummy adapters, offering universal compatibility through its reliable dummy battery connection system.
This compact 99Wh V-mount battery features USB-C and D-Tap outputs, powering DSLR and mirrorless cameras via an optional adapter plate.
This USB-C charger with LCD display supports various battery models via interchangeable variants, including Canon LP-E6, Nikon EN-EL15, and Sony NP-FZ100.
Lithium-ion Rechargeable Battery for Sony Digital Cameras, 2280mAH, 7.2V, Compatible with a9 II, a9, a7R IV, a7R III, a7 III, a6600
Lithium-ion Rechargeable Battery for DSLR Camera, 7.4V 860mAh, Compatible with Canon Eos -1100D, 1200D, 1300D,X50, X70, Rebel series
Rechargeable Li-ion Battery for Nikon Digital Camera, 1400mAh, for Nikon D3100, D3200, D3300, D3400, D3500, D5100, D5200, D5300, D5500, D5600
This variable ND filter features magnetic mounting with included step-up rings, enabling quick filter swapping and compatibility with multiple lens sizes.
This ND & CPL filter features a magnetic base, includes adapter rings, and is stackable, lightweight, and perfect for travel.
This set includes universal adapters and slot-in filters for ND, CPL, and Grad ND, working with wide-angle lenses for versatile setups.
UV, CPL, and ND filters with magnetic mount, eco-friendly material, minimizing flare, and fitting most lens sizes with adapter rings.
This diffusion filter, available in multiple thread sizes and a magnetic option, softens light for cinematic video and portrait effects.
This soft, durable rubber lens cap with a reversible hood fits lenses from 49mm to 82mm, with step-up rings included.
This versatile screw-on lens hood fits 52mm to 82mm lenses with included step-up rings, providing effective lens protection and shade.
This 5-in-1 collapsible reflector (gold, silver, white, black, translucent) works with most on-camera flash units and speedlights for versatile lighting.
DIGITEK DSB-080 (80 cm) Professional Octa Softbox for Speedlite provides soft, even lighting, enhancing your photography with speedlight compatibility.
The GODOX FotoStudio 60x90 Rectangular Softbox with Grid and Bowens mount enhances portrait and product photography with soft, controlled lighting.
The Neewer (2) 83cm Photography Studio Flash Translucent White Soft Umbrella provides soft, diffused lighting for professional photo shoots.
The Godox TT520ii Flash Speedlite offers GN33, 5600K color temperature, 0.1-5s recycle time, and compatibility with Canon, Nikon, and more.
The 2-in-1 Flash Diffuser Cap with silver/white reflector, made of flexible PVC, offers bendable design for creative light shaping.
This 5.5-inch built-in screen with 1080p video transmission and long-range control is compatible with DJI Mavic, Air, and Phantom series.
This durable, compact landing pad features a reflective surface for easy landings and is compatible with most drones.
